heading: Intelligent Routing
content: Improve authorization rates, reduce payment costs via our rule-based, volume-based and machine learning driven routing algorithms which can be integrated into your existing multi-PSP set-up.

heading: Payment Widgets
content: Embed APMs, BNPLs, A2A rails, and local payment methods as buttons into your current checkout to enable a seamless one-click checkout experience bundled with on-us routing to save costs.

heading: Revenue Recovery
content: Minimize involuntary customer churn with a multi-modal intelligent retry engine configured to 30+ parameters such as decline codes, error type, card bin, ticket size, region, payment method and more.

heading: Secure Authentication
content: Create customizable PSP-agnostic 3DS workflows tailored to the risk score from FRM engine or authentication solution providers to reduce fraud and improve customer experience by reducing friction.
